name: Day In Day Out
description:
Day In Day Out is a fascinating game that allows you to immerse yourself in the world of Mr. Lüneberg. The varied collection of mini-games, inspired by events of daily life, offers a unique gaming experience.

In the game, you have the opportunity to take on different characters and objects in Mr. Lüneberg's daily life. Whether you're playing as a fly in a waiting room, a photocopier in the office, or a popcorn-hungry boy in the horror movie theater, you'll experience a wide range of situations.

In addition to the captivating storyline, Day In Day Out also offers a challenge in the form of highscore lists. Play against others and try to become the best everyday player!

Experience the beauty and challenges of daily life in a completely new way with Day In Day Out.

  • An emotional journey of the everyday
  • Eight different mini-games
  • Highscores!
  • Short mini-games for in-between
  • Music by Louis Nostitz
